content.rendered:
Q2 Highlights

Here’s a quick update on our Q2, including an investment launch teaser, our recent international trips, a new team member and more.

As always, please contact us if you have any further questions or queries.

Coming Soon

We will be launching a new landmark investment opportunity in Manchester.

26 stories high and equipped with five-star amenities, it is located within walking distance of the city-centre, the university campus and national transport links.

We will be sending a launch email with more information. Once launched, please login to your Hub account for due diligence documents and financial illustrations.

Want to apply for a Hub account? Get in touch here.

Trips: Turkey & Dubai

At the start of Q2 Ollie and Tom visited Dubai to meet with investors and network with industry professionals.

At the end of this month, they will be travelling to Istanbul and Bursa to bring new investment opportunities to Turkey for the first time. Get in touch to book your meeting.

Welcome Abbie

In May we welcomed Abbie to the team.

Abbie joins the Home Cloud as our Junior Property Manager. She is responsible for managing our clients’ properties in South East England.

Welcome Abbie, it’s great to have you onboard!

Charity Golf Day

We were proud to sponsor the GLF Schools' Foundation Golf Day 🏌️

Chris and Tom enjoyed a round of golf and a spot of lunch. Proceeds support in-need families across 42 schools.

A big thank you to all organisers, participants and supporters.

 

That's all for now.

Please get in touch with the team to discuss our new property investments.  

 
Contact Us
